title: Reasons for unreported vandalism against businesses in England and Wales 2014
summary: This statistic shows , according to survey respondents , the Reasons for unreported against that should be addressed in the run up to the 2014 United Kingdom ( Wales ) General unreported ( as of 2014 ) .

With 43 % of respondents , Trivial/no_loss was considered to be the Reasons for topic , followed by the National Health Service ( Lack_of_police_engagement ) and the Private/dealt_with_ourselves ( EU ) .
gold: This survey shows the reasons businesses gave for not reporting cases of vandalism on their premises to the police in England and Wales in 2014 . Of respondents , 43 percent claimed they did not report the incident as there was no loss or damage or the crime was too trivial to report to the police .
